tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_108: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.',verse: 6074,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].',verse: 6075,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.',verse: 6076,},name: surah_108,};
